mapper.sql: sd.DAUTH_ID_ dauthId, sd.TENANT_ID_ tenantId, sd.ENTITY_ID_ entityId, sd.DAUTH_CODE_ dauthCode, sd.DAUTH_NAME_ dauthName, sd.ENG_NAME_ engName, sd.I18N_CODE_ i18nCode, sd.TABLE_ALIAS_ tableAlias, sd.DESCR_ descr, sd.IS_DELETE_ isDelete, sd.IS_FINAL_ isFinal, sd.CRT_TIME_ crtTime, sd.UPD_TIME_ updTime, sd.CRT_USER_ID_ crtUserId, sd.UPD_USER_ID_ updUserId
mapper.select: select count( sd.DAUTH_ID_ ) as counts from SYS_DAUTH sd left join sys_metadata_entity sme on sd.ENTITY_ID_ = sme.ENTITY_ID_

SELECT sdfi.FILTER_ITEM_ID_ filterItemId, sdfg.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ filterGroupId, sdfg.GROUP_NAME_ filterGroupName, sdfi.ENTITY_ID_ entityId, sme.TABLE_NAME_ tableName, sme.TABLE_ALIAS_ tableAlias, sdfi.FILTER_TYPE_ID_ filterTypeId, sdft.FILTER_TYPE_CODE_ filterTypeCode, sdft.FILTER_TYPE_NAME_ filterTypeName, sdft.TYPE_ filterTypeType, sdfi.FIELD_ID_ fieldId, smf.FIELD_NAME_ fieldName, smf.COLUMN_NAME_ fieldColumnName, sdfi.OPERATOR_ID_ operatorId, sdo.OPERATOR_NAME_ operatorName, sdo.OPERATOR_VALUE_ operatorValue, sdfi.VALUE_TYPE_ valueType, sdfi.FILTER_VALUE_ filterValue FROM sys_dauth_filter_join sdfj LEFT JOIN sys_dauth_filter_item sdfi ON sdfj.FILTER_ITEM_ID_ = sdfi.FILTER_ITEM_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_dauth_filter_group sdfg ON sdfg.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ = sdfj.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_metadata_entity sme ON sdfi.ENTITY_ID_ = sme.ENTITY_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_dauth_filter_type sdft ON sdfi.FILTER_TYPE_ID_ = sdft.FILTER_TYPE_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_metadata_field smf ON smf.FIELD_ID_ = sdfi.FIELD_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_dauth_operator sdo ON sdfi.OPERATOR_ID_ = sdo.OPERATOR_ID_ WHERE sdfg.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ = #{filterGroupId} AND sdfj.IS_DELETE_ = 0 AND sdfi.IS_DELETE_ = 0 ORDER BY sdfi.FILTER_ITEM_ID_

SELECT sdfg.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ filterGroupId, sdfg.DAUTH_ID_ dauthId, sdfg.GROUP_CODE_ groupCode, sdfg.GROUP_NAME_ groupName FROM sys_dauth_filter_group sdfg LEFT JOIN sys_dauth sd ON sdfg.DAUTH_ID_ = sd.DAUTH_ID_ WHERE sd.DAUTH_CODE_ = #{dauthCode} AND sdfg.IS_DELETE_ = 0 ORDER BY sdfg.FILTER_GROUP_ID_ desc
